comments:
Using an external Java application, I wasn't able to run the ARM and CBE analysis types together.  I get the following exception in the console when monitoring StartStop:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.instrumentation.internal.cbe.model.InstrumentEventHelpers.getMethodParamInfo(InstrumentEventHelpers.java:42)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.instrumentation.internal.cbe.model.CbeDataMapping.<init>(CbeDataMapping.java:43)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.instrumentation.internal.cbe.model.CbeInstrument.handleEvent(CbeInstrument.java:169)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.instrumentation.internal.cbe.model.CbeInstrument.handleMethodEntryEvent(CbeInstrument.java:100)
	at CbeProbe_probe$Probe_0._entry(CbeProbe_probe.java:29)
	at GenericArm_probe$Probe_0._entry(GenericArm_probe.java)
	at StartStop.main(StartStop.java)


The analysis types need to be mixed and matched to ensure that they don't conflict with each other.  We need test cases created for these if there are none available.
Fixed checked into head, Now you can only run the analysis type separately.  The work for the menu items was done in defect 184236
Updated target to match the iteration when this defect was processed
